intro: From AI Recorder to a Powerbank
portfolio: From leading tech brands like Lenovo and Kingston to AI startups such as mymind (AI-powered second brain), I've worked across several domains developing my intuition.

clan: ServaLabs, a hardware startup decentralizing Compute & Data. Our product, the iServer, replaces *all traditional IT hardware and software in companies. <ImageBW>Starcraft: Brood War</ImageBW>.
At that time (it was the early 2000s) I began to combine fun for this game and passion for my work, practicing building the first <ImageNO2>Numbers One</ImageNO2> website.
You can also find me exploring Neuroscience, Mental Models, History & GeopoliticsI give talks diving into AI’s actual capabilities and limits, and I love extrapolating its ripple effects.
about.method_title:
As a kid,
I tried a bunch of things:
method:
High-voltage physics experiments like tesla coils.Building websites and tinkering with tech.
Playing with model rockets.

The only true wisdom is knowing
you know nothing

Give me a lever long enough
and a place to stand
and I will move the Earth
If international recognition comes on top of that, it is a greater satisfaction.

contact.intro: For a cup of coffee or a discussion on philosophy, get in touch!
